#summary Ajax.js

= Method & Propriete =

method = 'POST' OR 'GET' DEFAULT : 'GET'
file = void OBLIGATOIRE
async = true OR false DEFAULT : false
send = void DEFAULT : null
out = 'TXT' OR 'XML' DEFAULT : 'TXT'
timetoexec = temp pour executer la requette DEFAULT 0

onsucess = FUNCTION DE RETOUR en cas de r√©ussite
onloading = FONCTION DE CHARGEMENT
start() = methode pour lancer lexecution de la requette


= Exemple =

req = new Ajax();
req.file = 'index.php';
req.timetoexec = 1000;
req.start();

______________________

req = new Ajax();
req.file = 'index.php';
req.out = 'XML';
req.async = true;
req.start(); 
______________________

req = new Ajax();
req.file = 'index.php';
req.timetoexec = 1000;
req.onsucess = function (callback) {
	alert(callback);
}
req.start();
______________________

req = new Ajax();
req.file = 'index.php';
req.timetoexec = 1000;
req.onloading = function () {
	alert('loading');
}
req.onsucess = function (callback) {
	alert(callback);
}
req.start();
